item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
My name is Robert Ruelas. I am a Technical Consultant and Software Developer that can help troubleshoot your hardware or elevate your next project. I’m also the co-founder and creative director of And Venus, a musical project that provides insight into the psychology of music.

I’m currently based in Houston, but mostly mobile and can work from anywhere in the world

After graduating with a degree in Psychology, I spent several years collecting behavioral data and working with computer hardware and software. Over time, I became fascinated with the technical aspects of computer hardware and began working for the largest company in the world, Apple Inc.

Genius

  • Certified Mac Hardware repair technician

  • Certified to assist clients with software-related issues, including but not limited to setup, configuration, updates, and conflict resolution

  • Exceptional technical support for all Apple products

  • Accurate and confidential record-keeping to track trends and improve processes

  • Collaborate and mentor teams

  • Proficent in SwiftUI

  • Proficient in networking and managing network information systems

  • ACMT

Technical Expert

  • ACiT

  • iPhone repair

  • iOS and macOS troubleshooting solutions

  • Consumer and customer relations

  • Peer review

  • Mentorship

  • Xcode

  • Beta testing

Behavioral Technician

  • Applied Behavioral Analysis (ABA)

  • Health and Behavior Intervention (HBI) Day Treatments

  • Problem Solving

  • Preference Assessment

  • Parent Training

  • Sibling Sessions

  • Social Skills

  • Shadowing & Inclusion

  • Speech Therapy

  • Autism Therapy

  • Data Analysis

  • Data Collection

I currently work with a variety of clients as a certified Mac Technician at Apple Inc., by performing hardware repairs and software troubleshooting. I’m also writing a book on the psychology of physical attraction, to be published next year.

On my spare time, I enjoy traveling and playing baseball. I also enjoy long walks with my dogs and reading fiction novels.
